title: Middlekauff - 3 and Out: Pats can bounce back from one "bad" year; Pro Bowl thoughts; 2018 regular season takeaways; Chip Kelly's UCLA recruiting train wreck
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 and Out: Pats can bounce back from one "bad" year; Pro Bowl thoughts; 2018 regular season takeaways; Chip Kelly's UCLA recruiting train wreck
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. Middlekauff explains why New England can bounce back from one "bad" year, looks at the Pro Bowl selections, Chip Kelly's UCLA recruiting struggles, and gives his biggest takeaways from the 2018 regular season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
